english: The whole tribe was in the joke .
chinese: 整个部落的人都卷入了这场恶作剧。

english: All europe was then embroiled in the war .
chinese: 当时整个欧洲都被卷入了战争。

english: It could still let us in for trouble .
chinese: 这仍可能使我们卷入麻烦中。

english: Johnson dragged us into a war .
chinese: 约翰逊把我们卷入了战争。

english: Everything was swallowed up in the blackness of darkness .
chinese: 一切都卷入了黑暗之中。
卷入造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: It would involve all rome in a fearful strife .
chinese: 这将使整个罗马卷入一场可怕的战争。

english: In the end he had got mixed up in some shady affair .
chinese: 最后，他卷入了一桩见不得人的勾当。

english: I never meant to get embroiled in anything too deeply .
chinese: 我从来也没打算要深深地卷入某一种工作。

english: I was a shade anxious about being drawn into the cuban business .
chinese: 我多少有点担心卷入古巴问题中去。

english: He was perpetually involving himself in this long lawsuit .
chinese: 他使自己无休止地卷入这场长时间的诉讼。

english: He was also loyal, and he didn't want to get anyone in trouble .
chinese: 他也很忠实，因此他不想使任何人卷入麻烦。

english: The best way out is for neither of us to get involved in cambodia .
chinese: 最好的出路是，我们双方都不要卷入柬埔寨。

english: We would be quite content with beijing's posture of noninvolvement .
chinese: 既然北京采取不卷入的姿态，我们也很满意。

english: He was reluctant to plunge into a bitter personal and partisan wrangle .
chinese: 他不愿卷入这种个人之间的和党派的激烈争论。
